text: Welcomed my friend Amb @NikkiHaley to @FIU with @RosLehtinen @MarioDB @RepCurbelo. We had a productive discussion on her recent trip to #Honduras & #Guatemala. I think leadership starts the day you are born. I don't think anyone is too young or too old to be a leader. We can be leaders in our families, in our communities, in our workplaces — and we should own that.

I say to all women and girls: own your voice and own your power. Carry it. Be proud of it. Always know that, whatever you're thinking or you're feeling, your voice is important and should be heard. #WomensHistoryMonth

Are you having déjà vu yet? The #BankLobbyistAct doesn’t benefit anyone besides the big banks. It’s time for the rest of us to fight back and demand that Washington work for us, not the big bank lobbyists. https://www.bloomberg.com/view/articles/2017-10-26/elizabeth-warren-don-t-let-big-banks-escape-the-fed-s-scrutiny

We’ve been down this road before. Whenever things are going ok in the financial system, the lobbyists flood the halls of Congress & convince politicians to roll back the rules – because what could possibly go wrong? http://www.nytimes.com/1999/11/05/business/congress-passes-wide-ranging-bill-easing-bank-laws.html

A report released this week says there has been no progress for Black Americans on homeownership, unemployment, and incarceration in 50 years. This is a stark reminder that racial inequality is real in America. Until we confront that truth, we will not be able to make progress.
